Thanks for your comment siwrath. This version is pre patched for r4 only. The unpatched version should work in the acekard 2i with no patch so long as you have AKAIO 1.5 and the latest loader. But it would not work in the R4 hence this version. You can find a clean rom on many websites.
Here's a link to the clean rom no patch uploaded by Cyroms http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5184355/[NDS]Assasins_Creed_2_-_Discovery

Still doesnt work with my R4 (using ver 1.12b software from r4ds.co.uk) Just get the same black screen with rom code and message to reset system :(

@Kreem Official R4 ceased at ver 1.18 www.r4ds.com. Am i right in thinking you have a R4SDHC? in which case the best compatability is to install ysmenu using the latest unoffical DSTT firmware. Hope this helps

@magic_phil - thanks for the info. I'm a ds noob so bear with me! Yes my R4 is the SDHC version and I'm using the software from the place I bought it. I'm reluctant to start changing the software as the games I've got on the memory stick have all got saves - if I changed the software would the new software create new saves?

@kreem You should backup any saves you have. Best advice is to backup all the contents of your sd card to a folder on your pc. If things don't work simply copy all the files back! :) Ysmenu is however compatible with your saves. The configuration file for ysmenu is ysmenu.ini this allows you to set the format to .sav or .SAV whichever you have been using previously. I think it should be automatically compatible but as i dont have an r4sdhc i can't say. In either case you can change it. Google "ysmenu on r4sdhc" should give you some advice.

@magic_phil - thanks again. Thing is I've noticed that I can't actually delete the save files off the memory stick (yup - ds noob!) I guess I might be able to copy and paste em to another location but I guess I'd be stuck with formatting the memory stick to get them off. Ah to hell with it - cant be bothered lol!
seems to be working great with my M3 DS simply. thank you so much!

@magic_phil - I've bought another memory stick, so would I be able to just download the software from the link you provided onto the new memory stick and put it in my R4SDHC card and it should work? I'm kinda getting the impression that newer games aren't going to work with my current firmware and yours seems to be the way to go.
Can ANYONE comment? The R4 cartridge doesn't have any physical memory that this software can 'write' to does it? I just don't want to bugger up the games that are working fine for me now.
Pricks...

@kreem apologies been busy with xmas. can u give me anymore details about your r4?? Is it an R4(i)SDHC?? my existing link is for DSTT (different type of card) and would not work unless this is the case. let me know and ill try and help

kreem unfortunately i dont own an r4sdhc but i have looked for you and apparently it is not possible to use ysmenu on one. http://gbatemp.net/index.php?showtopic=164359
but the kind folks at http://gbatemp.net will usually try and help if you post a message explaining your problems. . The other alternative is to buy a new flashcart with more regular updates eg. acekard2i or even dstt. try dealextreme.com. sorry i cant be of more help
Re R4i-sdhc,upgrade to new firmware v1.14b from maker's website and everything works ok.

@kreem you might want to look at http://irc.gbatemp.net/index.php?showtopic=193749 and find the latest firmware for your particular r4sdhc
